title: Twenty-four caprices. Opus 1 for solo violin - Nicolo Paganini (1782-1840)
brief_description: Considered the greatest interpreter of the works of Niccolo Paganini, violinist Ruggiero Ricci, on 10 January 1987, became the first violinist to record on video tape, Paganini’s “Twenty-four caprices” in one complete program. This is an unedited tape of that performance.
